name: @simon/nestjs-schematics
description: Schematics library to generate a kick starter NestJS project based on iFIT guidelines

scripts.postbuild: npm run copy:collection && npm run copy:schematics
scripts.copy:schematics: cpx 'src/schematics/**/templates/**/*.*' lib/schematics && cpx 'src/schematics/**/templates/**/.*' lib/schematics && cpx -p 'src/schematics/**/templates/**/.husky/**' lib/schematics && cpx 'src/schematics/**/templates/**/Dockerfile*' lib/schematics
